roleset.name: co-habitate with
roleset.note: SHACK_UP-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. Member of Vncls lodge-46. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from shack.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: And there I-2 was [*-2]-3 shacked [*-3]up with Eileen in that filthy fourthfloor attic on Hudson Street .
example.arg: in that filthy fourth floor attic on Hudson Street
